channel.title: How do you connect two objects that are off screen?
channel.description: If you've got a big patch (and a small laptop) where not all the objects fit on the screen, how do you create a cable that links between two objects that don't fit on the screen at the same time?

item.title: How do you connect two objects that are off screen?
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

is there a delay added when i use send and receive objects instead of cable (downwards, left to right)? or is it the same? does the placement of send and receive objects matter?

Read full topic

item.title: How do you connect two objects that are off screen?
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

You could move the objects closer to each other, connect the cable and then move it to the right position, with the cable connected?
